title: Error `Failed to send validator registrations to Beacon Node` when using MEV-Boost on Goerli
body:
### Description
- When using the following combo: Geth, Teku, MEV-boost, Web3Signer
- When starting the VC (a few minutes after the BN, to be sure the BN is well started)

I get the following error on VC:
```
2022-08-22 09:17:11.606 INFO  - Loaded validator key 90 of 109.
2022-08-22 09:17:11.608 INFO  - Loaded validator key 100 of 109.
2022-08-22 09:17:11.650 INFO  - Loaded 109 validators
2022-08-22 09:17:11.728 INFO  - Metrics service started and listening on 0.0.0.0:8008
2022-08-22 09:17:11.748 INFO  - Proposer config successfully loaded. It contains the default configuration and 0 specific configuration(s).
2022-08-22 09:17:11.768 INFO  - Starting EventSource client using URI: http://goerli-teku-beacon-0.goerli-teku-beacon.ethereum-common:5051/eth/v1/events?topics=head
2022-08-22 09:17:11.804 INFO  - Connected to EventSource stream.
2022-08-22 09:17:11.841 INFO  - Validator   *** Successfully connected to beacon node event stream
2022-08-22 09:17:11.951 INFO  - 103 validators are in active_ongoing state.
2022-08-22 09:17:11.951 WARN  - Unable to retrieve status for 6 validators.
2022-08-22 09:17:12.316 INFO  - Validator   *** Slashing protection loaded for validators: a1ec5a0, 89bb733, a7c4af0, 9472591, b973c80, b05a334, a3b17d0, 97d2753, a8a4c77, 8ae85f5, b652b72, a287f32, aa9d53a, 8fa37b3, 8b6946a, b5a6d14, aeb2ddc, b8dcbe8, b7ed740, b6495fdâ€¦ (103 total)
2022-08-22 09:17:12.326 WARN  - Validator   *** Slashing protection not loaded for validators: 84b5bf7, a1aafb7, 990edf3, 8e41ca5, 8a7fd13, 8a4b172
2022-08-22 09:17:13.914 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 3720986, Root: 3b6fda033b351b82e52f2df13d007a6808b8806626c3b9500265589166f8cce3
2022-08-22 09:17:14.472 INFO  - 0 out of 103 validator(s) registrations were successfully sent to the Beacon Node.
2022-08-22 09:17:14.472 ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to send validator registrations to Beacon Node
java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid params response from Beacon Node API (url = http://goerli-teku-beacon-0.goerli-teku-beacon.ethereum-common:5051/eth/v1/validator/register_validator)

```

Important lines are:
```
2022-08-22 09:17:14.472 ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to send validator registrations to Beacon Node
```

And eventually (but **NOT** always, or maybe after a very long time):
```
2022-08-22 09:18:25.016 INFO  - 103 out of 103 validator(s) registrations were successfully sent to the Beacon Node.
```

At the same time, the BN has this error:


### Specific configuration:
On BN:
```
      network: goerli
      ee-endpoint: http://goerli-geth-2.goerli-geth:8551
      builder-endpoint: http://goerli-mev-boost:18550
      validators-builder-registration-default-enabled: true
      validators-proposer-default-fee-recipient: 1268AD189526AC0b386faF06eFfC46779c340eE6
```

On VC:
```
      beacon-node-api-endpoint: http://goerli-teku-beacon-0.goerli-teku-beacon.ethereum-common:5051
      network: auto
      validators-graffiti: Kiln
      validators-external-signer-url: http://goerli-web3signer.ethereum-web3signer:9000
      validators-proposer-blinded-blocks-enabled: true
      validators-external-signer-public-keys:
      - 833fef779953772b365fd5afc29a67e00470892528ff84a3ec4a6ee59a452d8ba9ff921aacc3a5ca9bc133f653e3d408 
      - 84b5bf716cc68b5270ed17a0cd6efb2c92f8fe7c4ca940837cf9d703e5616e00632067c2cdfac69443cb004ee94565e2 
      - 89855009613df8ea96e52112e003379f9f0875ef813dea4f726965003eb74f1b2e9e7937726e3bfe416489b76815e184
     < ... and so on ...>
```

And VC recipients config:
```
      default_config:
        fee_recipient: 1268AD189526AC0b386faF06eFfC46779c340eE6
        builder:
          enabled: true    
```

### Additional information:
With the same configuration, everything works well on Sepolia.

### Versions (Docker on Kubernetes)
- geth: v1.10.21
- Teku (BN & VC): 22.8.1-jdk17
- Web3Signer: 22.8.1-jdk17
- MEV-boost: v0.7.10
